title: Bananenbrot
instructions: 2. Vermatschen: Bananen, Öl, pflanzliche Milch und Vanille, aber nicht zu fein pürieren
3. Trockene Zutaten dazu: Mehl, Zucker, Backpulver, Salz, Speisestärke und Teig gut umrühren
4. Teig in (gefettete) Backform füllen und bis zu 60 Minuten backen, ggf. mit Stäbchen probieren ob gar

title: Lentil Bolognese
instructions: 1. Cook the pasta, you can do it.
2. Meanwhile, sauté onions with garlic and turmeric in some oil until translucent.
3. Add vegetables, spices, and mushrooms, and sauté for 5-10 minutes depending on how roasted you want them.
4. Add lentils, tomatoes (and paste), sugar, vegetable broth, and nutritional yeast. Stir, bring to a boil, and then simmer over medium heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Serve with pasta and garnish with nutritional yeast or herbs.

title: Paella
instructions: 1. Fry the topping in some oil until golden brown and remove from the pan.
2. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in some oil until the onions are soft and translucent.
3. Add the rice and spices, stir well, and continue frying for a few minutes.
4. Add vegetable broth and stir again to distribute everything evenly.
5. From this point, do not stir anymore, or it will turn into risotto. Bring the paella to a boil for about 10 minutes.
6. Reduce the heat, then distribute tomatoes, topping, and peas on the paella and press them in lightly. Partially cover the pan and let the paella simmer for 10 minutes.
7. Once there is hardly any liquid visible, use a small spoon to check if a 'crust' has formed at the bottom of the pan.
8. If the 'crust' is satisfactory, remove the pan from the heat, let it rest briefly, and serve garnished.
